meanings.definition: A process for forming objects by electrodeposition on a mold.
meanings.sent1: The electroform was created using a special technique.
meanings.sent2: The jewelry was an electroform made with precision.
meanings.sent3: The electroform decided to take a mold of itself for fun.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was an electroform of pure joy.
meanings.sent5: The shimmering electroform caught everyone's attention.

meanings.definition: An object formed by the process of electrodeposition.
meanings.sent1: I admired the intricate details of the electroform.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed an impressive electroform of a flower.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat knocked over the delicate electroform.
meanings.sent4: His words were an electroform of wisdom.
meanings.sent5: The glowing electroform seemed almost magical.
